description: Childhood class positively relates to adult self-love.
estimand: Weighted mean change per class unit
notes: Primary model: survey OLS (HC3). Robustness: (1) treat classchild as categorical with Helmert contrasts; (2) ordinal logit with proportional odds check; (3) re-center outcome to z-score for scale sensitivity. Confirmatory code: analysis/code/confirmatory_models.py (SRS). PAP frozen 2025-11-04T10:06Z.

description: Current class inversely relates to depression agreement.
outcome_var: I tend to suffer from depression (wz901dj)

description: CSA exposure associates with higher anxiety agreement.
outcome_var: I tend to suffer from anxiety (npvfh98)-neg
notes: CSA_score_indicator derived via analysis/code/derive_csa_indicator.py (CSA_score>0). Robustness: (1) logistic regression (logit) on indicator vs linear probability; (2) replace indicator with 3-level ordinal bins (0, 1-3, 4+); (3) exclude high-exposure tail (CSA>15) to test leverage. Confirmatory code: analysis/code/confirmatory_models.py (SRS). PAP frozen 2025-11-04T10:06Z.

description: Supportive circles associate with higher self-love.
predictors: In general, people in my *current* social circles tend to treat me really well (71mn55g)
notes: Instrument equivalence confirmed 2025-11-03 via verify_social_support_equivalence.py; predictor now 71mn55g (97.3% coverage). Retain tmt46e6 as legacy variant for sensitivity.
